twitch_info.title: I wanna Gaze at the Horizon - Part 1
twitch_info.description: Decided to put these into parts for anyone who wishes to see my playthrough, also will be helpful for me if I need to remember strats for speedruns or further playthroughs of this game. My future YouTube video of the game won't be uploaded until I have an Any% clear of any duration, except for perhaps an all bosses or clear upload.

message.body: final hard save is thi sone
Not even half an hour yet
now we're at half an hour
I reset cause impossible alignment of spikes
the blue is so far to the left
That's going to make the jump hard
lol that sleepytime pause music eh
Nah, it's just the music of the stage. xD
This stage is really just an exercise in patience.
Very fitting music for that though.
I did that jump SUPER fast
dont forget your bigbrain strats this time XD
woah, i never seen this part of blocktroid before Kappa
Multiple games listed, I already did my blocktroid run XD
1 hour 51 in at stage 4. Been trying to get faster at the game.
Once upon a time I looked up guides to do most of these puzzles. I then forgot them after 2 years
Then figured them all out by myself since
This is the furthest I've gotten in figuring things out. So I'm gonna have to think on this screen.
do you recommend my some little hard fangame like best the 50 floors or something?
I mean I could do that strat
Plus we got a metal on top left
my first big clear is arcfox
You should be proud of that.
Horizon has only been cleared by 5-6 people btw
25 hours and other persons can do it in 3 hours FeelsBadMan
Yeah, but that's what I mean. For a first big clear that's really good.
Doing it in 3 hours takes a lot of time to reach that skill level.
Kurath didn't bother to clear Gaze despite reaching final boss, which I still find amusing.
That's 2 potential clears that never happened xd
my first supposed big clear was reach the moon but i surrender in the boss final, like in marathom, i am bad in bosses
the hardest boss i did is the guy of k2
Ah, I've always been the other way round.
I've had to pickup my skill needle
I'm about the same skill in both now.
i never wanted to clear arcfox, but i liked the game and i reached the final floors, and i cleared it
i clear the game if i want
I have tons of uncleared games
I just play whatever I feel like it ,really.
if the game is good i want to complete it
Ah, I know where the green needs to go now.
But I doubt that would work lmao
when i was in the final boss of reach the moon i don't wanted to continue, i cleared the fun part so, idk if i want to continue
idk anything of this game, teach me xd
Pink kills you by proximity or if you hit it.
The blinking slime kills you no matter whre you are if you hit it.
Just like pink except pink is also proximity mine.
green is acid slimes that kill metal slimes.
and red is explosion on contact
But explodes in a set radius
Breaks the black 4 square blocks yo usee.
there is like a lot of slimes in the game right?
slime park and this stage looks very similar xd
i think was slime park xd
Creator who made this made Keypick 100 and SlimePark
Never played them as I want to clear Gaze first.
i want to clear reach the moon and marathon, old debts.... xd
Trying to figure this one out is annoying actually xD
So I need to have a left over blue to get t hat red
i am not for puzzles xd
I guess I could waste a platform
that can't be it surely lmao
I'm pretty sure the solution requires me using every colour
I'm just trying to get into gear atm
Well, I know what to do now, so.
Every screen has a trick to it.
ye thought it coudln't be it
even if it may take a while xD
By destroying that piece I buggered my chances lmao
Right now I've clearly lost but
stop bumping into slimes me XD
As for biggest clear, I think for me that'd be NAMTG 100%, or IWTTT2 100%
why did I think this was a good idea
This is definitely the hardest puzzle so far
or was at least very close
But I think that's literally it
What's throwing me through a loop rn
is what is the metal slime for
I mean yeah it's only used in combo with explosion or to hit yellow slimes or green slimes at a distance.
But only explosion really makes sense with metal
I see the flaw in my plan
That's a very silly strat lmao
Almost got this one down p much
Puzzle games do that to a person
So I have to use the purple and red ok
Ever so slight problem with that lmao
why was I being such a dingus
But that is a little monka
I really have been puzzling for a while though huh
This is the final one, right?
I'm so looking forward to SlimePark now.
gonna eat smth real quick tbh
